definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: On the third floor they are selling linens.
There was a rich man who was clothed in purple and fine linen and who feasted sumptuously every day.
sentences.chinese: 有一個財主穿著紫色袍和細麻布衣服，天天奢華宴樂。

sentences.english: Is it for bowing his head like a rush And for spreading out sackcloth and ashes as his bed?
sentences.chinese: 豈是叫人垂頭像葦子，用麻布和爐灰當牀鋪麼？

sentences.english: I have sewed sackcloth upon my skin, and defiled my horn in the dust.
sentences.chinese: 我縫麻布在我皮膚上，把我的角放在塵土中。

sentences.english: Fine linen with embroidered work from Egypt was that which thou spreadest forth to be thy sail;
sentences.chinese: 你的篷帆是用埃及繡花細麻布作的，可以作你的大旗。

sentences.english: David also wore a linen ephod.
sentences.chinese: 大衛另外穿着細麻布的以弗得。

sentences.english: He is blanching linen in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 他正在陽光下漂白亞麻布。

sentences.english: She makes linen garments and sells them, and supplies the merchants with sashes .
sentences.chinese: 她做細麻布衣裳出賣，又將腰帶賣與商家。

sentences.english: Choose neither a woman nor linen by candle- light.
sentences.chinese: 擇妻選麻布，燈下靠不住。

sentences.english: Soon they didn’t even mind eating meat from these pieces.
sentences.chinese: 後來它們甚至不介意喫從亞麻布中得來的肉。

sentences.english: a day for a man to afflict his soul? is it to bow down his head as a bulrush, and to spread sackcloth and ashes under him?
sentences.chinese: 豈是叫人垂頭像葦子，用麻布和爐灰鋪在他以下嗎。

sentences.english: And he left the linen cloth, and fled from them naked.
sentences.chinese: 他卻丟了麻布，赤身逃走了。

sentences.english: Is it to bow down his head as a bulrush, and to spread sackcloth and ashes under him?
sentences.chinese: 豈是叫人垂頭象葦子，用麻布和爐灰鋪在他以下嗎？

sentences.english: For Aaron and his sons, they made tunics of fine linen-the work of a weaver
sentences.chinese: 他用織成的細麻布爲亞倫和他的兒子做內袍。

sentences.english: Joseph took the body, wrapped it in a clean linen cloth.
sentences.chinese: 約瑟取了身體，用乾淨細麻布裹好。

sentences.english: We want to buy Linen , Embroidered Bed, Bath and Table Linen .
sentences.chinese: 我們要採購亞麻布，刺繡牀，沭浴和桌布。

definition: cloth and silk/cotton and silk textiles
long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
